messages.message: Hi, I'm not sure how to use my Dove product properly. Can you help?
Of course, Tara! Which Dove product are you asking about?
I have the Dove body wash, but the instructions are a bit unclear for me.
I understand. Are you confused about how to apply it or how much to use?
Both, I guess. I just want to make sure I'm doing it right.
No problem! You can use a small amount on a wet washcloth or directly on your skin. Just lather it gently.
Okay, but how much is a small amount? I don't want to waste it.
A nickel-sized amount is usually sufficient for most people. You can always adjust based on your preference.
That makes sense, but should I rinse it off immediately or leave it for a while?
You should rinse it off after lathering for about 20 seconds to enjoy the benefits.
Thanks, Fred! But can I use it every day?
Yes, you can use it daily. It's gentle enough for everyday use.
Great! I appreciate your help, I'm still a bit confused, but this is better.
